title: 388. Andy & DJ CTI: Elon Musk Proposes To Buy Twitter At Original Offer, Pelosi Believes Dems Will Sweep Midterms & Trump Sues CNN For $475M
itunes:title: 388. Andy & DJ CTI: Elon Musk Proposes To Buy Twitter At Original Offer, Pelosi Believes Dems Will Sweep Midterms & Trump Sues CNN For $475M
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Elon Musk proposing to buy Twitter at the original agreed-upon $44 billion offering, Nancy Pelosi telling Stephen Colbert that she believes Democrats will sweep the midterm elections, and Donald Trump filing a lawsuit against CNN for defamation.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Elon Musk proposing to buy Twitter at the original agreed-upon $44 billion offering, Nancy Pelosi telling Stephen Colbert that she believes Democrats will sweep the midterm elections, and Donald Trump filing a lawsuit against CNN for defamation.
